definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Girl spy played a badger game with John, John failed into her trick.
sentences.chinese: 女特务对约翰用美人计，约翰上当了。

sentences.english: The trade name for this type of spying is the "honey trap."
sentences.chinese: 这类间谍活动美其名曰“美人计”。

sentences.english: They make seductive women to corrupt GetWord("corrupt"); the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他们对敌人使出了美人计。

definition: the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
indirect, psychological method of getting sb to do as one wishes (e.g. questioning whether they are up to the task)
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
lit. the plum tree withers in place of the peach tree/to substitute one thing for another/to carry the can for sb
In order to capture, one must let loose./to loosen the reins only to grasp them better
lit. please Sir, get into the boiling pot (idiom)/fig. to give sb a taste of his own medicine
